mapper.select: SELECT `index` AS `index`, `title` AS `title`, `release_date` AS `releaseDate`, `playing_time` AS `playingTime`, `thumbnail` AS `thumbnail`, `thumbnail_file_name` AS `thumbnailFileName`, `thumbnail_content_type` AS `thumbnailContentType`, `grade` AS `grade`, `view` AS `view`, `is_single` AS `isSingle`, `age_limit_type` AS `ageLimit`, `dimension_type` AS `dimensionType` FROM `terabox`.`movies`

SELECT CASE WHEN region_code IN ('Chung', 'Daej', 'Sej') THEN 'ChungDaeSej' WHEN region_code IN ('Bu', 'Dae', 'Gyeong') THEN 'BuDaeGyeong' WHEN region_code IN ('Gwang', 'Jeon') THEN 'GwangJeon' ELSE region_code END AS region, COUNT(*) AS count FROM `terabox`.`theaters` GROUP BY region

SELECT `theater`.`index` AS `index`, `theater`.`region_code` AS `regionCode`, `theater`.`name` AS `name` FROM `terabox`.`theaters` AS `theater` WHERE `theater`.`region_code` IN
('Chung', 'Daej', 'Sej')
('Bu', 'Dae', 'Gyeong')
('Gwang', 'Jeon')
(#{region})

SELECT `seat`.`index` AS `index`, `seat`.`row` AS `row`, `seat`.`column` AS `column`, `seat`.`seat_status_type` AS `seatStatus`, `seat`.`cinema_index` AS `cinemaIndex` FROM `terabox`.`seats` AS `seat` JOIN `terabox`.`screening_info` AS `screening` ON `seat`.`cinema_index` = `screening`.`cinema_index` WHERE screening.index = #{screeningInfoIndex}
